rooms.description: North-facing entrance as per Vastu with natural light and ventilation. Includes reception area, storage, and transition to main living spaces.
Spacious open-plan living area with minimalist decor, ample natural light from north-facing windows.
Adjacent to the living room, designed for a family of four with modern dining furniture and a view toward the open balcony.
Modern minimalist kitchen integrated with dining area, featuring energy-efficient appliances and sufficient workspace.
Dedicated living space for staff with attached small bathroom and storage. Located adjacent to the kitchen for easy service access.
Two-car garage designed for secure parking, integrated into ground floor layout near entrance.

openings.description: Spacious balcony on the north side for each bedroom, providing natural light and ventilation.
